channel.title: GitHub Vala Weekly Trending
channel.description: Weekly Trending of Vala in GitHub

item.title: BuddiesOfBudgie/budgie-desktop
item.description: Budgie Desktop is a familiar, modern desktop environment.

item.title: phw/peek
item.description: Simple animated GIF screen recorder with an easy to use interface

item.title: midori-browser/core
item.description: Midori Web Browser - a lightweight, fast and free web browser using WebKit and GTK+

item.title: linuxmint/timeshift
item.description: System restore tool for Linux. Creates filesystem snapshots using rsync+hardlinks, or BTRFS snapshots. Supports scheduled snapshots, multiple backup levels, and exclude filters. Snapshots can be restored while system is running or from Live CD/USB.

item.title: christianloopp/komorebi
item.description: A beautiful and customizable wallpapers manager for Linux

item.title: ErikReider/SwayNotificationCenter
item.description: A simple GTK based notification daemon for any Wayland compositor
